ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: Funding for this work was provided by The International Postgraduate Research Scholarship (IPRS) and UQ Centennial Scholarship to the first author. We would like to thank the School of GPEM, The University of Queensland and The Rufford Foundation (ref: 15263‐1) for funding this research. Thanks are also due to Dr. Bhagawan Dahal for providing field data. The valuable comments provided by Dr. Jane Elith, Professor Janet Franklin, Dr. Johan Eklöf, and two anonymous reviewers on the earlier version of this manuscript are gratefully acknowledged.
